alert.note: Alert for Buncombe; Haywood; Madison (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 3:11AM EDT until June 26 at 4:15AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Madison County in western North Carolina... Haywood County in western North Carolina... Northwestern Buncombe County in western North Carolina... * Until 415 AM EDT. * At 309 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles south of Greeneville to 14 miles east of Gatlinburg in Tennessee, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Waynesville, Marshall, Canton, Lake Junaluska, Weaverville, Clyde, Maggie Valley, Hot Springs, Smoky Mountains-Cataloochee and Leicester. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If camping, please seek sturdy shelter indoors now! Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
